name: Photo Project
title: Some photo story.

meta.splashText: The TFL tube finder app was a self-initiated work. One of my goals was to use the opportunity to help me learn the new Angular 2+ framework.

sections.title: UI + UX
content: The first paragraph is always the best

sections.title: Technical Architecture
content: The second is pretty good too

finalThoughts: Creating the app up to this point took a few months of my spare time, and in my opinion turned out well from a design and development perspective. It allowed me to develop my skills in Angular 2 + 4, and also develop my knowledge of component based development methodologies. If I were to do it again, I'd put more of a focus on developing more re-usable and generic components — an example being the auto-complete component.
